Text: Tavis or someone please help!!! I downloaded and installed successfully, but when I try to run it  says "the application has failed to start because the application configuration is incorrect." Please help!!! I really wanna play this game!
Try going to the games install directory.  You will see a DIRECTX directory.  Run "DXSETUP.exe" to make sure you have the newest version of DirectX.
i checked and i have the latest version of directX. darn! any other suggestions!?!?
This has a language choice when you first run it.  And yes English is one of the choices.

Hi,when I try to open the game,(after unraring it),to play it,I get as error :  with lots of numbers in it..    and then it just hangs! Can anyone please advise what could be wrong?  I'm sure I'm up to date with direct X,and other drivers seem okay aswell.... Any help will be greatly appreciatted.
         Thank you for this upload...if I can just get it to run?  :)

Why did you UnRar it?  It is already setup as an installer.  It installs it to the proper directory, and it creates shortcuts and everything.
It has no infections.  (Passes Avast)

So I recommend you scan everything with the av scanner of your choice, then run the EXE and then see if it works then.
